title: mod服和纯净服的对比
author: 边陲镇长
txt_content: 大家觉得mod服好玩还是纯净服好玩？

replies.author: 浪人蜂
replies.txt_content: 模组的话会更有乐趣，纯净的系统比较稳定

replies.author: cxl159桑
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 正义の冷子
replies.txt_content: 都是mc 就对了

replies.author: jerry730225
replies.txt_content: 更喜欢纯净

replies.author: 放肆的蘑菇
replies.txt_content: 我比较喜欢mod，纯净我感觉很无聊←_←

replies.author: 风堎
replies.txt_content: 每日一水混钻石~

replies.author: jfuyhv
replies.txt_content: 纯净长久 mod好玩不过不长久

replies.author: lm946999625
replies.txt_content: 对,mod服好玩但是联机的话多少有点卡，纯净服相对要流畅得多

replies.author: ttgttg
replies.txt_content: 没什么好不好的 都是个人观点

replies.author: 天空之城TMD
replies.txt_content: 更喜欢有mod的服务器，当然纯净也有纯净的乐趣

replies.author: ingsong
replies.txt_content:
mod服习惯了
mod可以提高游戏乐趣
你说呢

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content: mod服有趣 纯净服温馨 各有各的好吧

replies.author: DGK2
replies.txt_content: 纯净吧，,哎
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content: 哎，MOD服最高才1.7.10

replies.author: a66344512
replies.txt_content: 沒玩过MOD服,

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content: --------【金坛不败，水潭必败，火炭烧死，木@正义の冷子 窒息，吐痰必死】

replies.author: what_name
replies.txt_content: mod服超麻烦

感觉还是MOD服好玩
但是貌似很多插件不支持
哎~

replies.author: 袁敏
replies.txt_content: 不好权衡，个人喜欢纯净的

replies.author: 正义の冷子
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: jfuyhv
replies.txt_content: 我喜欢有mod的

replies.author: woshiliyiqian
replies.txt_content: 纯净的一般没有MOD的卡
